pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Make sure you have upgraded version of pipWindows```py -m pip install --upgrade pip```Linux/MAC OS```python3 -m pip install --upgrade pip```## Import package```from mglairflowutilslib import invoke_http_request```## Usage```url = 'http://example.com'request_type = 'POST'headers = {"Content-Type": "application/json"}payload = {"foo": "bar"}response, status = invoke_http_request(url, request_type, headers, payload)```
